Name: Percentage of cases where 'Payment Handled' occurs after 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR'
Metric: Percentage of 'Payment Handled' out of all 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR'

Name: Frequency of 'Payment Handled' in variants that include 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' at any point
Metric: Percentage of 'Payment Handled' out of all 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Percentage of 'Payment Handled' executions out of all activity executions in the event log
Metric: Percentage of 'Payment Handled' out of all cases

Name: Number of 'Payment Handled' events that follow a path containing 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' → 'Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE' → 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE'
Metric: Number of 'Payment Handled' activities for cases where activity 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' occurs

Name: Percentage of 'Payment Handled' among all terminal activities (i.e., compared to 'Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE', 'Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION', etc.)
Metric: Percentage of 'Payment Handled' out of all cases

Name: Frequency of 'Payment Handled' in the most common variant (Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE → Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION → Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR → Request Payment → Payment Handled)
Metric: Percentage of 'Payment Handled' out of all 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE'

Name: Percentage of cases ending with 'Payment Handled' that previously experienced any rejection (including 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER')
Metric: Percentage of 'Payment Handled' out of all 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Number of 'Payment Handled' events associated with case amounts above 100 euros
Metric: Number of 'Payment Handled' activities > 100 where ma is the last value of case:Amount

Name: Percentage of variants that reach 'Payment Handled' without any rejection step versus those that include at least one 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'
Metric: Percentage of 'Payment Handled' out of all cases where 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' does not happen

Name: Percentage of 'Payment Handled' occurrences that are directly preceded by 'Request Payment'
Metric: Percentage of 'Payment Handled' out of all 'Request Payment'

Name: Ratio of 'Payment Handled' to 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' across all cases
Metric: Percentage of 'Payment Handled' out of all 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE'

Name: Percentage of cases containing 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' that eventually still reach 'Payment Handled'
Metric: Percentage of 'Payment Handled' out of all 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Number of times 'Payment Handled' appears in variants that include more than one resubmission loop (i.e., multiple 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' after rejections)
Metric: Number of 'Payment Handled' activities for cases where activity 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' occurs

Name: Percentage of 'Payment Handled' executions performed by the 'SYSTEM' resource
Metric: Percentage of 'Payment Handled' out of all cases

Name: Frequency of 'Payment Handled' in variants that bypass pre-approver steps entirely
Metric: Percentage of 'Payment Handled' out of all cases where 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER' does not happen

Name: Percentage of total process completions (ending in 'Payment Handled') that originate from cases never involving a pre-approver
Metric: Percentage of 'Payment Handled' out of all cases where 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER' does not happen

Name: Number of 'Payment Handled' events following 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' without subsequent rejection
Metric: Number of 'Payment Handled' activities for cases where activity 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' occurs

Name: Percentage of 'Payment Handled' in domestic reimbursement cases (inferred from absence of approval loops beyond supervisor)
Metric: Percentage of 'Payment Handled' out of all cases where 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by BUDGET OWNER' does not happen

Name: Ratio of variants ending in 'Payment Handled' after 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' versus those ending in 'Payment Handled' without any pre-approver involvement
Metric: Percentage of 'Payment Handled' out of all 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Frequency of 'Payment Handled' per year, considering the two-year span of the event log
Metric: Number of 'Payment Handled' activities
